Module features engineering¶

This module defines the transformers used in the model pipeline.

Class¶

class src.domain.features_eng.DomainCleaner¶

Transformer class used to perform some cleanings”

fit(X, y=None)¶

The fit methode

transform(X, y=None)¶

The transform methode doing additional cleaning including the following steps : - outliers correction for the features “NB_VISITES” and “DUREE_SUR_SITEWEB_COL” - some categories groupings which are of common sense

Parameters

  • X (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) – input dataframe

  • y (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, optional) – target value, by default None

Returns

transformed dataframe

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame


class src.domain.features_eng.AddFeatures¶

Transformer class used to add new features

transform(X, y=None)¶

the transform method adding new features. In the final model only one feature are created “NB_DUREE_MOY_PAR_VISITE”

Parameters

  • X (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) – input dataframe

  • y (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, optional) – target value, by default None

Returns

transformed dataframe

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame


class src.domain.features_eng.FeatureSelector¶

Transformer used to select a subset of features(numerical vs. categorical)

fit(X, y=None)¶

the fit methode

transform(X, y=None)¶

transform methode used to select a given type of features

Parameters

  • X (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) – input dataframe

  • y (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, optional) – target value, by default None

Returns

transformed dataframe

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame


class src.domain.features_eng.RegroupeCreateCategoryAutre¶

Transformer class used to regroup categories with less than category_min_threshold and create the category “Autre”

fit(X, y=None)¶

The fit methode defines the categories to be grouped to the category “Autre”

transform(X, y=None)¶

The transform methode groups the categories as defined by the fit methode to one category “Autre”

Parameters

  • X (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) – input dataframe

  • y (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, optional) – target value, by default None

Returns

transformed dataframe

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame
